Atul has over 30 years experience in software services and software product development industry. He did several roles including a Global Business Solution center leader and a VP-Technical role in large organizations. 
Atul did his graduation from IIT Bombay (1982) B.Tech (Mech) and (PGDIE) in Industrial Engineering from NITIE Mumbai (1984). He has a passion for training and has conducted several courses for students and professionals. He was a recognized business trainer and a trained 'People Manager' for mentoring employees for choosing career paths, at IBM where he worked for over 10 years. His hobbies include farming, and training on personal finance management and promoting self-learning methods for soft skills.

Atul has taken a voluntary retirement from corporate jobs and is currently a free-lance consultant / coach / mentor role, to guide others to learn from his experience and setup organizational units that promote knowledge creation and best practices sharing within an organization. 
His focus is on employment enablement education for engineering and management graduates. His skills are in developing and conducting related training courses. He is an Innovation Council Member at a few engineering colleges.
He has a passion for learning new technologies to help mentor students. This includes Blockchain technology and Industry 4.0. He is imparting Industry consulting and project management skills for college faculty members and a few startups.

data.about:
He started his career as a R & D Engineer in a manufacturing organization and from there traversed through various roles like Marketing, Sales, IT-Hardware, IT-Software and finally landed into managing programs , first small and then large and finally managing P & L, Delivery and Relationship of the whole organization.
His goal is Enabling People and Programs to Achieve Success with Certainty!
He was entrusted to successfully establish the world's largest Passport Outsourcing Program for Government of India - Passport Seva Project as Project Director (At TCS) from scratch. I was able to successfully live up to management and 1.3 billion Indians' expectation to deliver the program, which services more than 15 million Indian citizens every year now. 
 
The GeM 2.0 was delivering well since 2016. However, it had to be highly scalable and agile for the next level of procurement by all departments of the Govt of India, thus GeM 3.0 was envisioned.I was entrusted for taking GeM Ver 3.0 live to be India's largest eCommerce site - Government eMarketplace (GeM) for Government of India (At Intellect Design Arena Ltd). The program currently clocks over INR 30,000 Cr annually. I was assigned with the responsibilities of deliveries for organizations (CRMNEXT) and large business units (NSEL, TCS). Working with fine professionals as CXO levels, I managed relationships for Business management of multi million US $ accounts (TCS, NSEL, CRMNEXT)
I specialize in Program Execution Excellence, P & L Management, Large Program Management, Strategy Definition, Client Management, Cloud Management, Delivery Management, People Management and Quality Management.
 
I would be happy to provide any information should that be of help to any organization or individual. My motto is " Success for Certainty."
Specialties: Software Project Management, Consulting, Program Management, Enterprise Architecture, Change Management.
